程序包 jse.parallel

接口 IShutdownable

所有已知子接口:
IAutoShutdown, IExecutorEX, IFullPathGenerator<T>, IHasAutoShutdown, ILmpExecutor, IPathGenerator<T>, ISystemExecutor, IThreadPool, ITimeAndParameterIterator<E>
所有已知实现类:
AbstractHasAutoShutdown, AbstractSystemExecutor, AbstractThreadPool, Bash, BashSystemExecutor, BufferedFullPathGenerator, CMD, CMDSystemExecutor, ConstantLmpExecutor, DumpPathGenerator, ExecutorsEX.AbstractExecutorEX, ForwardFluxSampling, Ising2D, JSE, JSESystemExecutor, LmpExecutor, Local, LocalSystemExecutor, MethodThreadPool, MonatomicParameterCalculator, MPC, MPI.Comm, MPI.Group, MultipleNativeLmpFullPathGenerator, NativeLmp, NativeLmpExecutor, NativeLmpFullPathGenerator, NeighborListGetter, NNAP, ParforThreadPool, PowerShell, PowerShellSystemExecutor, PWSH, PWSHSystemExecutor, Python, PythonSystemExecutor, RandomForest, RemoteSystemExecutor, SRUN, SRUNSystemExecutor, SSH, SSHSystemExecutor, WSL, WSLSystemExecutor
函数接口:
这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。
